QuestData.Title: Gerenzo the Traitor
QuestData.Description: <The Gnomecorder comes to life with a loud buzz.>$B$BCome in, $n! Are you zhere? I have noted on ze map that you are near ze Cragpool Lake vater vheel, is that correct?$B$BIt vould appear that ze Venture Co. has holed up at ze vheel. Have a look around vhile you are up zhere. If you happen to zee a traitorous gnome by ze name of Gerenzo Wrenchwhistle, put your boot firmly up his keester for me and for Gnomeregan! I vill pay handsomely!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: You vill be taking care of ze gnome, yes?
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: You kill vith a passion! Zuperb!
QuestData.RewardText: <The Gnomecorder buzzes loudly.>$B$BVonderful! That's von more name I can scratch off of my list!$B$BI vill be in touch.$B$BXakxak, out!
